content:
吳恩達 is a professor of artificial intelligence at the Stanford AI Lab. His research interests include distributed robotics, mobile computing and programmable matter. He leads the Robotic Neurobiology group, which develops self-reconfiguring robots, systems of self-organizing robots, and mobile sensor networks.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed neque elit, tristique placerat feugiat ac, facilisis vitae arcu. Proin eget egestas augue. Praesent ut sem nec arcu pellentesque aliquet. Duis dapibus diam vel metus tempus vulputate.
summary: 吳恩達 is a professor of artificial intelligence at the Stanford AI Lab. His research interests include distributed robotics, mobile computing and programmable matter. He leads the Robotic Neurobiology group, which develops self-reconfiguring robots, systems of self-organizing robots, and mobile sensor networks.
title: Alice Wu 吳恩達

content:
栾浩教授的研究方向主要集中在无线通信网络构建、协议设计、性能分析与系统安全，主要包括无线多媒体网络、边缘计算网络、数字孪生网络、车联网、移动计算等，发表学术论文200余篇，出版英文专著5本。主持国家自然科学基金面上项目，区域联合重点项目，科技部重点研发计划项目课题，澳大利亚ARC Linkage项目。曾获IEEE Vehicular Technology Society 2017 Best Land Transportation Paper Award，澳大利亚迪肯大学信息学院杰出科研奖，加拿大安大略省研究与开发贝尔奖学金，国家优秀自费留学生奖学金，陕西省百人计划等奖项。
👉查看全部研究成果

content:
郑金凯于2024年6月获西安电子科技大学博士学位，于2023年-2024年在加拿大维多利亚大学进行博士联合培养。东莞市“战略科学家团队”成员，现于西安交通大学从事博士后研究，合作导师为沈学民院士与栾浩教授。研究方向为车联网、数字孪生、网络资源优化、强化学习、博弈论。在IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications、IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing、IEEE International Conference on Computer、IEEE Transactions on Vehicular Technology、IEEE Transactions on Network Science and Engineering、IEEE Wireless Communications等国际顶尖期刊和会议上发表学术论文 20余篇，曾获得IEEE MetaCom 2023最佳论文奖。长期担任IEEE TWC、IEEE TMC、IEEE JSAC、IEEE TCOM、IEEE TDSC、IEEE TCCN等国际顶尖期刊的审稿人
👉查看全部研究成果
summary: 郑金凯于2024年6月获西安电子科技大学博士学位，于2023年-2024年在加拿大维多利亚大学进行博士联合培养。东莞市“战略科学家团队”成员，现于西安交通大学从事博士后研究，合作导师为沈学民院士与栾浩教授。研究方向为车联网、数字孪生、网络资源优化、强化学习、博弈论。在IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications、IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing、IEEE International Conference on Computer、IEEE Transactions on Vehicular Technology、IEEE Transactions on Network Science and Engineering、IEEE Wireless Communications等国际顶尖期刊和会议上发表学术论文 20余篇，曾获得IEEE MetaCom 2023最佳论文奖。长期担任IEEE TWC、IEEE TMC、IEEE JSAC、IEEE TCOM、IEEE TDSC、IEEE TCCN等国际顶尖期刊的审稿人
title: 郑金凯

Slides can be added in a few ways:
Create slides using Wowchemy’s Slides feature and link using slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file Upload an existing slide deck to static/ and link using url_slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file Embed your slides (e.g. Google Slides) or presentation video on this page using shortcodes. Further event details, including page elements such as image galleries, can be added to the body of this page.

content:

IEEE Transactions on Vehicular Technology, 2022. 借助知识迁移，提升车联网中异构网络的选择效率。

IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, 2023. 提出基于博弈论的数据同步策略。

IEEE Transactions on Network Science and Engineering, 2023. 使用学习方法优化车联网任务卸载。

IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management, 2023.提出了一种在多域有线/无线网络中实现时间敏感网络管理的方法
Privacy-Preserving Deployment Mechanism for Service Function Chains Across Multiple Domains
IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management, 2023.设计了一种跨多域服务功能链的隐私保护部署机制

IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management, 2023.综述了机器学习在网络切片全生命周期中的应用

IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management, 2024.提出了一种基于容量限制最短路径巡游的服务链方法，适应服务需求和网络拓扑的变化

summary: This paper provides a comprehensive exploration of the Internet of Digital Twin (IoDT), detailing its evolution, technologies, frameworks, applications, and integration with advanced technologies to enhance physical system performance.
title: Internet of Digital Twin: Framework, Applications and Enabling Technologies

content:
恭喜栾老师在2025年3月25日在IEEE发表论文Internet of Digital Twin:Framework, Applications and Enabling Technologies。
2025年3月25日——西安交通大学网络空间安全学院栾浩教授团队的研究成果《Internet of Digital Twin: Framework, Applications and Enabling Technologies》近日被IEEE旗舰期刊（影响因子10.961）正式收录。该论文系统构建了数字孪生网络（IoDT）的功能框架与技术体系，为工业互联网、智慧城市等领域的虚实协同与安全防护提供了理论突破与实践路径，标志着我国在数字孪生技术领域的国际学术影响力进一步提升。
summary: 恭喜栾老师在2025年3月25日在IEEE发表论文Internet of Digital Twin:Framework, Applications and Enabling Technologies。
title: 栾老师于IEEE发表论文Internet of Digital Twin:Framework, Applications and Enabling Technologies

summary: This paper introduces SPIN, an efficient LLM inference serving system leveraging speculative decoding, which addresses limitations of current approaches through dynamic selection of heterogeneous small speculative models (SSMs), batch-optimized request decomposition during verification, and GPU-pipelined execution coordination, achieving a 2.28× performance improvement over state-of-the-art methods.
title: SPIN：Accelerating Large Language Model Inference with Heterogeneous Speculative Models

summary: 栾浩老师在兰州大学应急管理研究中心作学术报告
title: “数字强边系列讲座”（第九期）顺利举行——西安交通大学栾浩教授
